title: Bruce almighty
creator_credit: Jim Carrey, Tom Shadyac, Spyglass Entertainment and Universal Pictures
brief_description: Local tv reporter Bruce Nolan doesn’t think that the world is treating him fairly. Then, after the worst day ever, Bruce angrily rails against God for ruining his life and mismanaging the universe. So God responds and endows Bruce with all of his powers to see if he can do a better job. Cast includes Jim Carrey, Morgan Freeman, Jennifer Aniston, Philip Baker Hall, Catherine Bell.
